questions.question: What is the Breadth First Search Algorithm used for??

answers.a: To search the shortest path in a graph.
answers.b: To search the longest path in a graph.
answers.c: To search the most visited node in a graph.
answers.d: To search the most isolated node in a graph.

questions.question: Which data structure is used to store the nodes in the Breadth First Search Algorithm?
What is the time complexity of the Breadth First Search Algorithm in the worst-case scenario?
Which list is used to store the visited nodes in the Breadth First Search Algorithm?
What happens when a node is visited in the Breadth First Search Algorithm?

answers.a: The node is added to the open list.
answers.b: The node is removed from the open list.
answers.c: The node is added to the closed list.
answers.d: The node is removed from the closed list.
